text: Led data extraction and evaluation efforts to save Best Buy more than 11M over the course of tenure
description: While the $11M saved is impressive, the description 'led data extraction and evaluation efforts' is vague. It could be improved by adding specific details about the tools and techniques used (e.g., SQL, cloud platform, statistical methods) and the scope of the efforts. For example, 'Led data extraction and evaluation efforts using SQL and AWS services, analyzing data from over 10 million customer records to identify and resolve data quality issues, resulting in savings exceeding $11M'.

text: Coached data team throughout short and long-term projects, redefining documentation frequently
description: While coaching is a good sign for leadership, the description is somewhat vague. Mentioning examples of how the candidate developed team members or specific leadership skills used would be beneficial. Also, redefining documentation can be strengthened by adding context or examples of the benefits of better documentation.
